00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : UpdateG
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 
00013 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00020 !

00027 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 
00029  SUBROUTINE UpdateG
00030 
00031 ! Common Variables
00032  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00033  USE Domain
00034  USE FluidParams
00035  USE LBMParams
00036  IMPLICIT NONE
00037 
00038 ! Local Variables
00039  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js, xs, ys
00040  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoSqX_f, gradRhoSqY_f
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2_f, gradRhoXY2_f, gradRhoYX2_f, gradRhoYY2_f
00042 
00043 ! Square of the density gradient (components and full)
00044  DO j = ylg_f, yug_f
00045    DO i = xlg_f, xug_f
00046 
00047      gradRhoXX_f(i,j) = gradRhoX_f(i,j)*gradRhoX_f(i,j)
00048      gradRhoXY_f(i,j) = gradRhoX_f(i,j)*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00049      gradRhoYY_f(i,j) = gradRhoY_f(i,j)*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00050      gradRhoSq_f(i,j) = gradRhoXX_f(i,j) + gradRhoYY_f(i,j)
00051 
00052    END DO
00053  END DO
00054 
00055 !--------- Differential terms for potential formulation of interfacial force ---
00056 !--------- Interpolate the density in the pressure/momentum mesh ---------------
00057  DO j = yl, yu
00058    DO i = xl, xu
00059 ! Source nodes for the interpolation
00060      xs = 2*i - 1
00061      ys = 2*j - 1
00062 
00063 ! Identify first neighbors
00064      ie = ni_f(xs,ys,1)
00065      jn = ni_f(xs,ys,2)
00066      iw = ni_f(xs,ys,3)
00067      js = ni_f(xs,ys,4)
00068 
00069 ! Gradient of the square of the density gradient
00070      gradRhoSqX_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,ys) ) &
00071                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,js)          &
00072                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,js) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,jn)
00073 
00074      gradRhoSqY_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(xs,js) ) &
00075                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,js)          &
00076                   + gradRhoSq_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(ie,js)
00077 
00078 ! Second derivatives of rho
00079      gradRhoXX2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,ys) ) &
00080                   + gradRhoXX_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,js)          &
00081                   + gradRhoXX_f(ie,js) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,jn)
00082 
00083      gradRhoXY2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(xs,js) ) &
00084                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,js)          &
00085                   + gradRhoXY_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(ie,js)
00086 
00087      gradRhoYX2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,ys) ) &
00088                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,js)          &
00089                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,js) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,jn)
00090 
00091      gradRhoYY2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(xs,js) ) &
00092                   + gradRhoYY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(iw,js)          &
00093                   + gradRhoYY_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(ie,js)
00094 
00095 ! Copy the values of the second derivative arrays and pre-multiply by kappaEf
00096      GX(i,j) = kappaEf*( gradRhoSqX_f - gradRhoXX2_f - gradRhoXY2_f )
00097      GY(i,j) = kappaEf*( gradRhoSqY_f - gradRhoYX2_f - gradRhoYY2_f )
00098 
00099 ! Copy the value of rho from the overlapping f-mesh nodes
00100      rho(i,j) = rho_f(xs,ys)
00101 
00102 ! Rescale and copy values of the gradient of rho from the f grid to the g grid
00103      gradRhoX(i,j) = 2.D0*gradRhoX_f(xs,ys)
00104      gradRhoY(i,j) = 2.D0*gradRhoY_f(xs,ys)
00105 
00106    END DO
00107  END DO
00108 
00109  RETURN
00110  END SUBROUTINE UpdateG
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:10 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
